scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --platform=node && pkg dist/index.js --output app --public && pnpm rename
scripts.rename: mkdir -p ../src-tauri/binaries && mv "app$([[ "$OSTYPE" =~ msys|win32 ]] && echo .exe)" "../src-tauri/binaries/app-$(rustc -vV | awk '/host:/ {print $2}')$([[ "$OSTYPE" =~ msys|win32 ]] && echo .exe)"
